d.Name: Integration Flow Design Guidelines - Run an Integration Flow Under Well-Defined Boundary Conditions
d.Description:
More details on the guidelines covered in this integration package can be found on SAP Help Portal.

The documentation explains as well how to work with the Postman collection attached to this integration package.
d.ShortText: This integration package contains integration flows to illustrate the design guidelines for managing resources. More details can be found on SAP Help Portal.
